1.title: "Grasping Bed and Couch"

notes: Wordless sequence of 4 panels in which a woman patient tells her psychiatrist about her bed trying to grab her, after which the psychiatrist's couch reaches for her.

notes: SUMMARY: Skyler has to mow the lawn because of Cosmo's wheezing.

6.heading: Grass.

10.heading: Grass.
